ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup fresh chives, finely chopped

cookingTips: Cook potatoes in salted water and drain while still warm so they absorb seasoning better
Cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces while still warm for better absorption of the creamy dressing
Combine sour cream and yogurt to get tanginess without excess richness—adjust ratio to taste
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a lighter potato salad using yogurt for tang. Are you looking to reduce richness compared to mayo-based salads? We can discuss how sour cream and yogurt interact with warm potatoes and the importance of fresh chives for brightness.
